rune.author: billythegoat101
rune.sacrifices: Sacrifice: -16xIronIngot + 6XP Notes: -Right-clicking will give you back your XP and pause the rune for a short time. -While the rune is paused, it will glow yellow and not absorb any XP. -Not accessible by other players.
rune.description: Description: Stores all XP. When you walk over it it will take all your levels. It will also store any XP orbs dropped onto it. Not useable by other players.
